Description: Condition: Excellent with little to no signs of wear! The Billy Corgan Terz Signature guitar is a product of Billy Corgan's desire for Reverend to create an electric Terz after years of capoing on the third fret. A "Terz" is an instrument tuned to a minor third (G-C-F-A#-D-G). It's punchy and shimmering, rich in overtones, a perfect for adding color accents or driving rhythms to spice up any song. It features a 21.5" short scale roasted neck, so the guitar can be tuned higher with regular tension. The korina body is the same as the regular Billy Corgan signature model, and is loaded with a single Railhammer Billy Corgan pickup in the bridge. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Korina Solidbody Body Color/Finish: Satin Deep Sea Blue Burst Neck Wood: Roasted Maple Neck Profile: Medium Oval Neck Joint: Bolt-on Fingerboard Material: Roasted Maple Fingerboard Inlays: Dots Radius: 12" Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend Pin-Lock Scale Length: 21-1/2" Bridge: Hardtail Pickups: Billy Corgan Bridge Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-Way Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not Included Country Of Origin: South Korea Serial Number: 30715 Weight:6.62 lbs. Switching: 3-Way Pickup Switch: P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge & Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
Title: Reverend Billy Corgan Terz - Satin Deep Sea Blue Burst - Premium Preowned
